title: Little Hedgehog's Halloween
itunes:author: Rhea Pechter
itunes:summary:
LSFTP Update! My LITTLE HEDGEHOG PICTURE BOOK is AVAILABLE NOW! Find it by searching for "Little Hedgehog Goes to School" on Amazon or by visiting [THIS LINK](https://amzn.to/3RRovO5). I hope you LOVE IT!
My Little Hedgehog picture book is out now! Find it by searching for "Little Hedgehog Goes to School" on Amazon or by visiting THIS LINK. I hope you LOVE IT! 
Little Hedgehog and Bebe realize at the last minute that it is HALLOWEEN! Which costumes will they choose? Will there, in fact, be a Halloween Parade? And what will happen when they approach a spooky tree while out trick-or-treating? You'll just have to listen and find out. ENJOY!
If you love this story, please share it with all prickly bears, any and all ants headed into mysterious tunnels, every single self-help book aficionado, and your friends! They might just need a good story these days. Big People: leave a rating or review in your podcast app! 
If your tiny person wants to share a story they've written, please send photos or recordings of it to rhea@littlestoriestinypeople.com. I'd LOVE to see their artwork, stories, and anything else they'd like to share.
Thank you to MAE for helping me with the super important reminder message at the beginning of this episode! 
And thank you to REED, COLLIN, RUBY, LP, and EMILEIGH for the sound effects used in this story!
Visit my website, www.littlestoriestinypeople.com, to sign up for my email list, find book recommendations, Little Hedgehog tees, my picture books, and more!

content:encoded:
LSFTP Update! My LITTLE HEDGEHOG PICTURE BOOK is AVAILABLE NOW! Find it by searching for "Little Hedgehog Goes to School" on Amazon or by visiting THIS LINK. I hope you LOVE IT!

My Little Hedgehog picture book is out now! Find it by searching for "Little Hedgehog Goes to School" on Amazon or by visiting THIS LINK. I hope you LOVE IT!

Little Hedgehog and Bebe realize at the last minute that it is HALLOWEEN! Which costumes will they choose? Will there, in fact, be a Halloween Parade? And what will happen when they approach a spooky tree while out trick-or-treating? You'll just have to listen and find out. ENJOY!

If you love this story, please share it with all prickly bears, any and all ants headed into mysterious tunnels, every single self-help book aficionado, and your friends! They might just need a good story these days. Big People: leave a rating or review in your podcast app!

If your tiny person wants to share a story they've written, please send photos or recordings of it to rhea@littlestoriestinypeople.com. I'd LOVE to see their artwork, stories, and anything else they'd like to share.

Thank you to MAE for helping me with the super important reminder message at the beginning of this episode!

And thank you to REED, COLLIN, RUBY, LP, and EMILEIGH for the sound effects used in this story!

Visit my website, www.littlestoriestinypeople.com, to sign up for my email list, find book recommendations, Little Hedgehog tees, my picture books, and more!
